import React from 'react' import "./moviecard.css" import MovieRating from './MovieRating' const MovieCard = ({movie}) => { return (

{movie.title}

{/*

PG - 13

*/}

{movie.year}

{movie.genre}

{movie.time}

{movie.description}

{/* Read More */}
{/* WATCH TRAILER*/} {/* GET*/} {/*USERS RATINGS*/} {/*BOOKMARK*/} {/* */}
{/* FOLLOW */} {/* */}
); } export default MovieCard
